question: Ankur Mittal is associated with which sports?
explanation: Indian shooter Ankur Mittal has clinched the individual as well as the team gold medal in men\'s double trap at the 7th Asian Shotgun Championship at Astana, Kazakhstan on August 5, 2017. Mittal shot 71 in the six-man final to finish at the top of the podium. With scores of Sangram Dahiya and Mohammad Asab added to Mittal\'s final total, India managed to bag the top prize in the team event also. Dahiya had a score of 43 and Asab had shot 34.
